LinkUserAndEvent(address,uint256).details: register a user to an event and event to user

addCreation(address,uint256,string,strin.details: Register a creation for a given author

params._URI: Address of the image, used before minting the NFT
params._user: Address of the user to register as author

addNewUser(address,string,string,string,.details: Add a new user to the DB, using parent classes

addOrganization(address,string,string,st.details: add an organization to the list of orgs

params._logoURI: Link to the icon lo		user.organizationState[orgId] = true;

adminAddMedal(uint256,address).details: A medal is associated to an event, whatever its status

params._nft: address of medal nft associated to the prize

adminEndEvent(uint256).details: The event ends now,checks we are an admin for the event

adminGiveMedalToWinner(uint256).details: Affect the medal owned by the event to the winner of the competition

adminSetEventPosition(uint256,string,str.details: Set the geographic position of the Event

adminSetWinner(uint256,address).details: The event gets a winner and closes,checks we are an admin for the event

adminStartEvent(uint256).details: The event starts now, checks we are an admin for the event

affectNFTtoCreation(uint256,address).details: Register a creation for a given author TESTED

params._creationId: index of the creation as registered in allCreations

checkorganizerisAdminOf(uint256).details: returns true if the user is admin of the organization

checkorganizerisAdminOf(uint256,uint256).details: returns true if the user is admin of the organization

eventGetMedal(uint256).details: returns the id of the medal associated to the event

eventGetPositionX(uint256).details: returns X coordinate of an event

eventGetPositionY(uint256).details: returns Y coordinate of an event

eventGetWinner(uint256).details: returns the id of the winner associated to the event

eventHasMedal(uint256).details: checks if event has a medal

getAdminList(uint256).details: returns the list activ admin of an organisation

getAuthor(address).details: returns the Author struc corresponding to the user TESTED

getAuthorCreationsList(address).details: returns the list of creations for user _author TESTED

getCreationList(uint256,uint256).details: returns the list of creations: they may be inactive, must test activ value TESTED

getEvent(uint256).details: returns the details of a specific event

getEventCurrentState(uint256).details: returns the current state of the event

getEventList(uint256).details: return the list of events associated to an organization

getOrganizationsList(uint256,uint256).details: returns the list of organization : they may be inactive, must test activ value

getOrganizerAddressById(uint256).details: returns the address of an admin, given an id organizer

getOrganizerOrganisationList(address).details: returns the list of organization the organizer subscribed to

getSportsManEventsNumber(address).details: returns the nb of activ events the sportsman registered to

getSportsmanEventsSubscriptions(address).details: returns the list of activ events the sportsman registered to

getSportsmanList(uint256,uint256).details: returns the list of organization : they may be inactif, must test activ value

getUserDetails(address).details: Returns details about a user, given an address (for UI=)

getWinner(uint256).details: returns the winner of the event

newEvent(uint256,uint128,uint128,string).details: creates a new event, associated to an organization

organizationAddAdmin(uint256,address).details: add an admin to an org.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

publishMedal(uint256,bool).details: add / remove the medal from user gallery. Nota: checks are done in getSportsmanMedal

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw().details: Withdraw token placed in the contract
